Room Standard

A first for a 4-star Boutique Hotel in Mui Ne, Vipol Muine Hotel offer split level living, surrounded by the latest high-tech comforts and conveniences.

  • Room size: 45 - 50 sqm
  • View: Beach View
  • Beds: Double bed: 1
  • Smoking: No
  • Max occupancy: 4 Adults + 01 Child under 4

5.000.000 VNĐ

4.000.000 VNĐ

Features

Spend Great Time in Our Hotel!

Elegantly luxurious with a décor that mixes contemporary style and Oriental chic; our stunning split-level Duplex suites enjoy magical views over the city’s rooftops. Entered via a hallway, the beautifully furnished ground floor contains a Kingbed room with stylish furnishings and silk cushions.

Upstairs, a king-size bed swathed in luxurious 500-thread count linens takes pride of place in the sumptuous bedroom. Adjacent to this lays a large light-filled bathroom with walk-in shower or separate bathtub.

Textured furnishings and supreme attention to detail differentiate these remarkable two-floor suites from all others.

Facilities

    Highlights
  • Special design for 4 Adults + 01 Child under 4
  • Window/City View
  • Daily complimentary international buffet breakfast
  • Daily housekeeping & turndown service
  • Electronic safe deposit box
    Technology
  • 32’’ flat screen TV with cable program
  • IDD telephone
  • FREE Highspeed Wireless internet access
  • Refrigerator & Minibar
  • Dual split-type Air-conditioning
  • Electrical adaptor
  • Electronic Key Card System
  • 24-hour power back-up
  • Security peephole
    Bed & Bath
  • 1st Floor: 01 King bed or 02 Twin beds & 2nd Floor: 01 King bed
  • Crib available upon request
  • Bathroom with standing shower & bathtub Iron & ironing board
  • Weighing scale
  • Hair dryer
  • Shaver outlet (220 volts)
  • Deluxe toiletries
  • Make up/shaving mirror
    Others
  • Welcome drinks & refresh towels
  • Orientation map
  • Daily complimentary fruit platter
  • Coffe table & chair
  • Tea bags & coffee making facilities
